title: My Portfolio
description: A portfolio showcasing my skills, projects, and achievements with a modern, responsive design.

title: Decentralized ChatX
description: Built a secure messaging platform using blockchain for user authentication and message storage. Supports private and group chats with real-time communication via WebSockets. Messages are securely stored using Ethereum smart contracts and Pinata Cloud for decentralized file storage.

title: ChatX
description: Developed a responsive messaging platform using the MERN stack with real-time communication via Socket.io. Implemented Zustand for state management, JWT for secure authentication, and styled the UI using TailwindCSS.

title: Steganography
description: A Python-based steganography tool for encoding and decoding text within images,text,audio ensuring secure and hidden communication.

title: Smart Inventory
description: An inventory system integrating a weighing scale with cloud-based data management via ThingSpeak for real-time tracking and analysis.

title: Car Safety System
description: A Iot based prototype alcohol detection system that automatically turns off a car engine when alcohol is detected, enhancing driver safety
